document.full_text: lee westwood stayed on course to regain the world number one ranking but returned disappointed after a lightning threat halted his charge in the second round in the indonesian masters on friday.
document.title: lightning threat halts lee westwood charge in indonesia
lines_and_colors: lee westwood stayed on course to regain the world number one ranking but returned disappointed after a lightning threat halted his charge in the second round in the indonesian masters on friday.
